website_summaries.verdict: A good-quality blender that stands out for being easy to use.
pros: This Pro model is praised for its large size and ease of use
Owners report that it is good at blending and is also easy to clean
cons: Leaks were an issue for some, and many felt the motor was less powerful than some of the other NutriBullet blenders

customer_reviews.title: To fast
customer_reviews.text: The unit is way to fast. At first I thought this was normal but after a couple of weeks the rubber below the blades started to rip appart. The cup contact ears broke within a month.
customer_reviews.author: JanBal

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS, LEAKS, AND MORE LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived in good order, but I believe the NutriBullet Company's products are made cheaply compared to what they were just a couple of years ago. I tried my new unit yesterday and I do know that you have to seal the blades onto the plastic glass container rather securely. I did. However, quite a bit of my drink ended up leaking out and dripping down into the motor housing...what?!!? I'm not a weak person, and I do know how to secure the unit prior to mixing a smoothie...but it leaks, simple as that. Totally unacceptable, not to mention somewhat dangerous - I imagine. Returning item for refund. NutriBullet needs to use much more effective gasket, I guess. Roger
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: We've given this a good shot and we're not happy
customer_reviews.text: We've given this a good shot and we're not happy. We had the original NutriBullet and used it every day. We decided to upgrade to the better model and it is SO, SO Loud you need to leave the room when it's running, not to mention it unscrews the base from the container making a mess. We actually think there might be something wrong with this specific one, but can't figure out how to exchange it through Amazon. We'd like to try a different one and hope ours is just defective. If not, then we would prefer to go back to the original model.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: What were they thinking?
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself and the accessories work as described. The included "Nutribullet Pocket Nutritionist" and "Blasting For Optimum Health Recipe Book" are absolutely pathetic! I was actually looking forward to these 2 items so that I could get up to speed with the Nutribullet but they are full of useless testimonials, sales hustle and only contain the bare minimum information. They will go right into the garbage where they belong. Buyers would be much better off if the company stopped shipping this nonsense and passed the production & shipping cost savings on to the buyers in the form of a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Stock46260

customer_reviews.title: INHERENT DESIGN FLAW WILL DISABLE THE NUTRIBULLET
customer_reviews.text: THE NUTRIBULLET STOPPED WORKING TODAY. THERE IS AN INHERENT DESIGN FLAW. JUICE FREEZES THE 3 WHITE SPRINGS ALONG THE TOP RIM OF THE HOUSING RENDERING IT INOPERABLE. EVERY OWNER CAN EXPECT THIS TO HAPPEN. THE MANUFACTURER SHOULD SEND OUT A TROUBLESHOOTING BULLETIN TO EVERY PURCHASER. CALLING CUSTOMER SERVICE I WAS TOLD TO APPLY SOAPY WATER TO THE FROZEN SPRINGS AND TO WAIT 2-3 MINUTES. HOWEVER, IT REQUIRED USING A SCREW DRIVER AND A SMALL TACK HAMMER TO FREE THE SPRINGS. WHEN THE NUTRIBULLET WORKS IT IS A GOOD PRODUCT. THE BLADE DESIGN IS HAZARDOUS. IT'S A GLORIFIED BLENDER. PURCHASERS SHOULD CONSIDER BUYING A QUALITY BLENDER INSTEAD.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Yennior

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Cog broke in under one week of usage, leaks happen.
customer_reviews.text: I used the NutriBullet Pro for like a week, first i suffered with leaks, until I observed that I had to tighten the cup very hard, started to make smell and black debris under the motor, then the rubber cog under the blade just broke away. very loud, had to pray every time of use that it wont explode on my face, very disappointed...I have ordered 2 more blades and giving this one more go before I drop it completely and throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Asiem El Behidy

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Don't overfill cups!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Nutri Bullet Pro!! Works great. Solid, quality construction. Use it every single day with NO leaks whatsoever. The key to no leaks? .... (1) Do NOT fill the cup past the "Maximum" fill line. (It's clearly marked on the cup!) (2) If using ice, use only CRUSHED ICE. (3) The ice should make up NO MORE THAN 25% of your smoothie. (4) DO NOT put the blade assembly in the dishwasher because the heat from the dishwasher will warp the gaskets ...And warped gaskets can cause leaks. * Follow these 4 steps and you're golden! (Also it wouldn't hurt to read the instruction booklet!) Happy blending!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel28

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 30 days and shady warranty coverage
customer_reviews.text: We only used the nutribullet around 10 times. The motor and screw on blade do not sync or connect for the blade to blend. Purchased Squaretrade but it does not cover until the manufacturer warranty is up (would have been good to know before buying the coverage). Went to Nutribullet, submitted the info for the warranty, received a confirmation email containing excessive steps to print that email and mail, along with the receipt, to a PO BOX. The mailing step must be done before any claims can be made. Thanks for making things difficult. We are disappointed by all parties involved in this transaction. Never buying a nutribullet or a squaretrade coverage plan again.
customer_reviews.author: BMH

customer_reviews.title: I bought it about 8 months ago. Now it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it about 8 months ago. Now it won't start. The slot on the power base is stuck so when I press the cup and vessel blade, it won't push down to start it. I am a very neat and careful cook, so this is definitely a product defect. I've had years of a basic waring blender. This is such a disppointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shot out melted plastic
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Within 10 seconds of having the bullet on, the unit starting making a horrible noise and shooting out melted plastic. My kitchen was covered in melted plastic and the inside of the unit was completely melted! I've since read that this issue has been ongoing with NutriBullets and that the company is doing nothing to address the issue, and blaming the consumer for improper use. As mentioned, the unit was on for approximately 10 seconds, the blending cup was not filled past the fill line, and there was plenty of liquid (I was making a smoothie). Please be careful if you own one and DO NOT BUY ONE if you do not own one.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia A.

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: I am excessively disappointed in the quality of this product. I’ve had it barely 2 months and it doesn’t work any more-just stopped in the middle of blending a shake. I bought one of these over 10 years ago and it was awesome, but it was destroyed in a house fire. This one was terrible. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Myers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I started getting into fitness about 2.5 years ago and used other products to blend my morning smoothies or after work out shakes. There is nothing easier than the nutribullet. Blends through ice, frozen fruits, veggies, everything I've thrown at it so far. I've had it now for about 1.5 years and nothing has needed replacing, broke, or malfunctioned. I recommend it to everyone that asks what blender I use. Currently buying 2 for friends for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Sutliff

customer_reviews.title: Poor product quality- don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Unit stops working intermittently during use- within 6 months of use. When I called the warranty department, they diagnose that its because of oil leaking from the blade and offered to send me a new blade unit. They were initially asking me to pay to ship the new blade (company policy apparently)- which is ridiculous, because this isn't my fault. The company makes bad parts and asks me to keep paying for their mistake?! But if the new blade also has the same issue and if this issue persists and I need replacement blades every 6 months- what's the use? Just go and buy some other product
customer_reviews.author: ArcS

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointing!! Poor blade/gasket design
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing for the few days it worked. After just 2-3 uses, the rubber gasket came loose and wrapped around the blade. Amazon sent me a replacement but that gasket also came loose after just a week. Nutribullet’s only solution is to replace the entire blade every time the gasket becomes loose. After further research, this seems to be a common issue that the manufacturer refuses to address. I‘m super disappointed and won’t be purchasing another Nutribullet product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They break
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 of these- one purchased and then replaced under warranty. Both have broken with the same flaw. The blender blade and container assembly sticks under the tabs on the motor housing and the only way to get it loose is to break the motor housing. This is a bad design flaw. In addition, you have to very firmly screw the blades to the containers, otherwise they leak. I used strap wrenches to tighten them. At least I did until the motor housing broke again. Now I'll be looking for another brand. Wouldn't buy this is I were you.
customer_reviews.author: pwr

customer_reviews.title: Much better at making smoothies than my Ninja blender (which I ...
customer_reviews.text: Much better at making smoothies than my Ninja blender (which I thought was good!) I’ve been making kale & avocado smoothies for my keto diet and this blends things up to a uniform consistency - whereas my Ninja blender left the items separated and watery rather than smooth and smoothie-like. I’m sure my Ninja is still better for heavy duty blending for ice drinks as the Nutrabullet motor isn’t intended to run for more than a minute without overheating. Happy with my purchase and recommend for nutritional drinks...but not, say, for margaritas or pinacolodas
customer_reviews.author: April Steele

customer_reviews.title: Terrible cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 5 weeks ago. Today the seal in the blades compartment snapped, sending fluid all my cabinets and into the motor. A waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: mary gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years with daily use
customer_reviews.text: We used this blender daily with good results for two years but there were annoying issues to consider. The containers had to be replaced every 6 months because the tabs were breaking off. It does not blend with just one of 3 of the tabs missing. When blending, the cap would un-tighten itself, oozing your shake down into the gear hole. Very annoying. A reverse thread is needed. This problem became increasingly worse as the bearings begin to tighten which failed today, almost 2 years from the purchase date. Overall we got our money's worth, with some annoyance. Trying a different brand this time. Blessings!
customer_reviews.author: T.Grigs

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this at least once a day. Has not leaked yet. I upgraded from the original smaller one that I used every day for three years. This thing is amazing. It liquifies my kale, spinach, bluberrie, carrot, banana smoothie every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: After only two months of purchasing it has already quit working. This is our third model we’ve owned. Never have we had one die within two months. Of course the return date had passed. Amazon support was no help and connected us to nutribullet support also no help. Yes it’s plugged in, no it’s not overheating. I’ve used this product enough to know how to operate it properly. I don’t appreciate being treated like an idiot and not listening when I tell you what exactly is wrong with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: decent smoothie maker, with a flaw
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a NutriBullet as an alternative from the big VitaMix. It mixes well, not as well as the VitaMix, but it's lighter, cheaper, and makes a mostly-blended smoothie. This is my second NutriBullet. I gave up on the first one due to excessive leaking. Very messy! This one worked great - then, after a few weeks of use, it started to leak. I close the top as tightly as i can (yes, i work out), but evidently i do not have the strength to close it tightly enough to prevent leakage. My husband can tighten it enough to prevent leaks, but i am unable to. This is a fatal design.
customer_reviews.author: shoplee

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken - Safety Hazard
customer_reviews.text: I should preface this by saying this was an Amazon Warehouse product. However, the description said it was discounted for cosmetic damage (when actually the NutriBullet doesn't have any cosmetic damage that I can find.) I did not even get to try this product as the fan on the bottom had all but one one of it's "wings" broke off and the rest you can hear rattling around in the machine. Not only would the machine probably have overheated if I would have ran it, I'm sure the plastic pieces could have got caught in something or burned up. The shipping box shows no signs of damage whatsoever. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Working perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this daily for 2 months now, for smoothies. So far it's worked flawlessly, even when my husband throws ice cubes into his. We previously had a Breville boss to-go which was extremely loud and shook a lot. It worked ok, until mental pieces from the blades came out in my salsa! For being half the price, this Nutribullet has been superior. It's not as loud, but still very powerful, the base doesn't shake, it's easy to clean, and we haven't experienced any leaks. I will update if anything goes south, but so far we're really enjoying this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Used Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this at my office, so have been wanting to replace my ninja. It's so much easier and convenient. Quick to use. I feel I received a used machine however, and piece of glass came out of it. Disappointed it wasn't brand new for the price. There were some markings that I could tell made it seem used. Also the box didn't have any tape on it when it came.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT LEAKS LIKE A SIEVE!
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT LEAKS LIKE A SIEVE! I have tried and tried to use this and not have it make a mess in my kitchen. On every use it leaks into the power base. It's as if there is a compression ring missing. I would not buy this again - in spite of the fact that my wife had good experiences with an earlier product from the same vendor.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Beach

customer_reviews.title: Just get one :)
customer_reviews.text: Great gadget for making protein shakes! I have a Vitamix and was hesitant to get this because of the functionality of the Vitmaix but this is more convenient for making smoothies and shakes. Smaller batches means it’s easier to customize your shake for each person plus clean up is easier. It takes less time to use the billet blender as well and it takes up less counter space. If you are a healthy shake or meal replacement fan, get one! I bought mine from the warehouse with damaged packaging but everything was in there and it was in tip top shape!
customer_reviews.author: E. Hull

customer_reviews.title: about two weeks in the smoke rolled out of it and it sounded like it missed a gear on the drag strip
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these on the first of Dec. 2016. Burnt the motor up at the end of Dec. 2017. One year warranty, of course. Bought another one, about two weeks in the smoke rolled out of it and it sounded like it missed a gear on the drag strip. Unbelievably, it is still running, for now. Moral of the story- If you intend to make frozen smoothies every morning, spend your money and buy a heavier machine.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Hinshaw

customer_reviews.title: It's only 900 watts?
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought that I was buying the 1200 watt blender. When I received my package, I was a little upset to see that I did not get the 1200 watt with the pulse button. Nonetheless, I thought I would still try it out. The first three days I smelled hot motor windings and was thinking that I needed to return this thing. About the fourth day, I did not smell the motor windings. The blender will chop up or breakdown oatmeal such that you cannot detect that it is even in the smoothie. (something that we could definitely tell with our old blender) .
customer_reviews.author: Mustache_you_a_?

customer_reviews.title: It died after two times!
customer_reviews.text: I am sick I was able to use this three times!!! It will not start. Nothing makes it start. It died! I am so disappointed. I have never been more disappointed in a product. It’s beautiful. The two drinks I made were fabulous. But now it’s dead!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lioness

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, worked perfect for three weeks
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. It worked perfect for three weeks then stopped. It was expensive. Now I have to contact the company to try for a refund or replacement
customer_reviews.author: Denise Ann

customer_reviews.title: The noise level is obscene.
customer_reviews.text: I like a lot of things about this unit but there is an overwhelming issue with it and I HATE it for that. The NOISE LEVEL is obscene. Not only that but it sounds like it has a bad bearing. It’s. It my unit. I strongly believe they are all like this. It’s sad because it’s otherwise a nice unit. Why oh why can’t they put in a quite brushless motor and insulate the body. I don’t know why everyone doesn’t complain about this harsh loud fact. Again good unit BUT wear hearing protection. Not kidding.
customer_reviews.author: Marius Morosanu

customer_reviews.title: They must have changed the product. Now it sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Cup will NOT press into base. This seems like it is a known problem. One of the "trigger buttons" that depresses is just stuck, and will not depress, so you have to jam it on so hard that I'm sure it'll break in a few weeks. Really just trash.
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Item Broke in 5 months of use  and they want me to pay the shipping o stars
customer_reviews.text: Item Broke in 5 months of use actually exploded scary , and they want me to pay the shipping to replace another $10.00 ....o stars if I could . I gave them 1 star at least they anser the phone , I wouldn't buy this thing your blender will do the same thing....It's very scary they way the unit wobbles if you don't have your hands on it , terrible customer experience..
customer_reviews.author: Doug Dow

customer_reviews.title: Great but not better than a Ninja
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this since it has the larger cups. I have a Ninja and love it, but I can't find cups larger than 20oz for it. This blender is pretty, and the cups are great. However, I'm very disappointed with the blend quality. It does not do well with ice at all. It also struggles with frozen strawberries. My Ninja never leaves any chunks. This one unfortunately does leave large unblended chunks. Disappointed especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed in this new one
customer_reviews.text: OMG....I JUST BOUGHT THIS IN FEBRUARY and now it doesn't work!!...the last one we had lasted 4 years and I used it every day! So disappointed in this new one! I will be sending this back!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Huffman

customer_reviews.title: I have been really pleased overall with the power of the motor and the ...
customer_reviews.text: We never, ever, fill even to the max fill line and still sometimes have problems with the blade leaking during operation. It's not a consistent leak and not a large leak, but a bit of an annoyance. Even so, I have been really pleased overall with the power of the motor and the consistency of the smoothies (made with frozen fruit, spinach, nut milks and the occasional add-in of chia seeds or cacao nibs).
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for fruit smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this Nutribullet. It makes wonderful smoothies and cleans up easily. I have hand washed it and never put the parts in the dishwasher. Yesterday while my blueberry smoothie was running, I hear the motor slow down- so I shut it off right away. The rubber gasket came loose and wrapped around the blade and the smell was terrible. Since its under 30 days, I am returning it for a replacement. I have high hopes for this blender because I really loved it up until its breakdown.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Good product, usually.
customer_reviews.text: I have had Nutribullets before. I needed a new one, I purchased the champagne colored one. The power words fine, the blades are sharp and it blends well. The base smells of a horrible chemical/burning plastic when it’s running. I though maybe because it was new, but nope, even after more then 10x it smells. I have to plug it in outside to use it because my whole house smells like a chemical fire if I use it indoors. The box was too damaged to return. I’d buy this product again, but from a retail store.
customer_reviews.author: StephCA

customer_reviews.title: Love this Nutribullet
customer_reviews.text: I've had several smoothie makers and this is by far the best of the best. Pulverizes nuts, flax seed and frozen fruit / veggies into a smooth drink in less than 30 seconds. No gritty residue in the drink. Comes with a Hard bound recipe book.
customer_reviews.author: qsquared

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender to make morning smoothies at my parents’ house during an extended stay. They have a Ninja (terrible for kale) and we are used to our Vitamix at home, but I wasn’t willing to pay $$$$ to buy a Vitamix just for a short-term stay. This blender was the perfect substitute! It processed all ingredients smoothly, including kale, and I had the freedom to customize smoothies for my wife and I. The problem with the Vitamix is when you make a smoothie for two, both people need to drink the exact same thing. With the Nutribullet, I can have double the protein powder. The clean-up is easy and the attachments for the cups are great. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chris!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protien shakes
customer_reviews.text: First off...this unit does not leak if you screw the cap on properly. The second time I used it, I had leakage and it was because I hadn't screwed the cover on tight enough. The unit is loud, so no 2am shakes unless you live alone. The 32 oz cups are awesome and the various covers, rings and handles make it perfect. Ice, frozen fruit...no problem. I'm super happy with this purchase and look forward to many yummy concoctions.
customer_reviews.author: Becky J Barrow

customer_reviews.title: Convenient in every way
customer_reviews.text: Bought this second set for our vacation home. Just love how quick and easy this blender mixes shakes, sauces, hummus, etc. You'll love the easy clean up, the small profile of the machine for storage, and the ease of flipping the cup over, unscrewing the blade, and walking out the door. I use my first NutriBullet Pro at least 2 times a day and it's still going strong twenty months later.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great power.  Good investment.
customer_reviews.text: I've been enjoying my Bullet for about a month now and I love it. I use it to make breakfast smoothies. It is super powerful and quick. Literally takes me about 5 minutes to throw everything I want in it, blend and go. The blending itself takes under a minute. Love that it came with a book with tons of recipes and two canisters with to-go lids. I bring it to work in the same container I blended it in. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I've owned a NutriBullet for years and always loved it. This however did not come with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I never review items on Amazon. But when I attempted to use my NutriBullet Pro this morning, it made a giant mess. I've owned a NutriBullet for years and always loved it. This however did not come with the rubber gasket to properly seal the blade to the cup so needless to say, my attempt at bullet proof coffee this morning did not go so well. I've now had to order the rubber gaskets from Amazon. So make sure you go ahead and order the rubber gaskets up front because according to the reviews, everyone is dealing with leaks and I bet this is why!!
customer_reviews.author: Serena Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect single use blender
customer_reviews.text: I use this blender every day. After going through several other blenders and having difficulty with the blades not chopping the ice well enough or things getting stuck, I ordered the Nutribullet and love it! I only make smoothies for myself so it didn't make sense to need an entire pitcher to then have to clean. With this I can make and drink my smoothie out of the same cup. It also comes with an extra cup and covers for traveling. I have had zero problems with this blender so far. It is compact for easy storage and both the cups and blade cover go right into the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT - FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS
customer_reviews.text: This product does a great job, if you follow the directions. In my first few tries, I had some leakage, but it was because I didn't tighten the base enough, or when trying to pulse, I was applying counter-clockwise rotation (clockwise locks it "on.") The other problem is that I use frozen fruits, and the whole mix wants to freeze. Like others I have also overfilled it. BUT, if you follow the directions, it does an excellent job. I have a 1000 watt Ninja full size blender that does much worse, and it is more work to clean, and I wanted s personal blender with a small footprint, and a cup I could drink from.
customer_reviews.author: Geldscheisser

customer_reviews.title: Best For Work and Home
customer_reviews.text: I'd used this version at a previous job to prepare daily drinks and such. It operates as advertised by finely blending no matter what you put into it, from seeds to chunks of ice. Some technique is required for those chunks though. I have owned one in my home now for 3 months with no issues and regular use. Not a con in any way but more of a dad observation, it would be helpful if the handle came as it is, and also attached to the spouted lid. The handle is perfect for little hands but they would never drink from such a large opening. 5 stars across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Great pulverizing
customer_reviews.text: The very 1st time I used this I product I thought it wasn't working.I didnt read the instructions becuade I'd thought that this would be just like a blender. However,after I'd explained this to someone then the person told me that I needed to press down the cup into the base n then turn and I did exactly that and now it works wonders for me.I read the booklet and the recipe book.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a few uses, twice!
customer_reviews.text: Nutribullet claims that when the gasket separates from the blade assembly, it can’t be replaced. You need a new blade assembly. The gasket popped right off when removing the cup on the second use of my blender. So I returned it and ordered a replacement. Gasket came off after the third use this time! The design or manufacturing is clearly defective. It’s a shame, because it worked well for making smoothies the few times I was able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Casey

customer_reviews.title: NutriBullet Blade does not fit properly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the NutriBullet 900 series. Why did I give it a 3, you may ask? Because the quality was good. The cup was made as good as the original, but the blade doesn't fit. I spilled liquid all over my new machine! It screws on over half way and then you have to wrench it down and then it still didn't seal. I went to the manufacturer site and purchased the accessories I want. So, if you want a great cup that doesn't fit the blender, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cannonlily

customer_reviews.title: Blend your way to a new YOU!
customer_reviews.text: I can now make any food into a healthy shake! I just throw my McD’s into the nutribullet with a little Mountain Dew, and it blends all the nutritious parts while removing all the bad stuff (I guess), so I can enjoy a healthy smoothie that’s loaded with vitamins. It’s also powerful enough to blend things like chocolate, chicken parm, and whatever. I do 6-7 of these a day. I’ve gained a little weight but I’m assuming it’s all muscle. Thank you, nutribullet, for blending up a healthier, happier me! Great blender.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Lang

customer_reviews.title: Looks Better than It Is
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had these kind/brand of blenders So I though, “awesome, it’s the pro and it’s pink!” But it’s super loud and not as good as the regular version of these blenders. I was very disappointed. I still use it, but when I do I have to cross my fingers hoping it blends everything...like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Kalia Boiser Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This blender is really convenient. I have another $300 blender, which is great but it’s a hassle to pour it into a new cup and clean the container when I’m in a hurry. This blender is perfect because I can make a smoothie, rinse off the blade, twist on the cap and it’s ready to take with me. Less time and less cleaning. The blender itself is also pretty powerful, it blends my frozen ingredients well and the 900 watt is definitely an upgrade over the 600 watt, which I had previously. Overall I’m really happy with this blender and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Will Aston-Reese Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, good product, but stick with original.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of the nutribullet, but this one almost has too much power for the size, of that makes sense! It smoothes out food etc wonderfully but you need to add quite a bit of liquid to get it moving! Honestly, I would go with the original. Even though this has a larger capacity, the power is just too strong for the size. It works great, but not quite as good as the original.
customer_reviews.author: Heather prentice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Grinds almost anything with ease; fruit (frozen or fresh), carrots, broccoli, kale, ice. Nice to get 4-5 servings of fruit and veggies in one nice smoothy! The design is also sleek (but not small) and looks OK on the counter. We needed a second smoothy maker and tried a Ninja pro (figuring it would be nice to try both). The ninja is incredibly noisy! It sound like a jet engine and is almost painful to stand next to (OSHA would not approve)! We immediately returned the Ninja and bought another NutriBullet Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Tom K

customer_reviews.title: It could be better
customer_reviews.text: ITS SO LOUD. Also beware if you have arthritis, after blending it's hard to take the top off. I don't have any hand issues like that (I'm a 38 yo female) but sometimes my husband has to take the top off for me because I can't. Also the prongs on the containers are starting to break off and those push down the buttons on the blender to make it work. I haven't used it in a while and it's just kinda collecting dust at this point. It's not a bad product, it just needs some minor improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast Smoothie
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great smoothie every morning! I use a quarter of a large apple, about 12 red grapes, about 1 1/2 cups of spinach, about twelve walnuts or almonds, about 1/2 cup milk, one scoop of whey vanilla flavor and 5-7 ice cubes. Delicious! And healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kratochvil

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday for my birthday. I needed another to replace my ninja that was dying. I was so excited to get this but my first try at making a protein shake was more like juice but i figured that i just needed to work out the ingredients. I did find that the seal was coming lose while blending. I thought maybe it was a fluke until i made another shake today and the seal did the same thing. This is very frustrating as i was very excited about getting this. If anyone has any suggestions i would appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: IT LEAKS after three months use
customer_reviews.text: I have owned three of these and each time I have to contact the manufacturer due to leakage!!! I am so tired of doing this! Why don't they just send an extra one if they can't seem to resolve this. I don't even use it every day. I like the concept of this ...easier than my blender. I wouldn't recommend buying one. I have just contacted the manufacturer to get the base replaced due to massive leakage after only owning it for 4 months! M. Krause
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I had the 600W version and it lasted for almost 5 years. Bought this one and talk about a big difference this thing is powerful the cups are huge so I can make The equivalent of two smoothies at one time and it blends in a matter of seconds...totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smooth smoothies !
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to it! In terms of using. It blends VERY well, nuts and seeds too. It can even be used to make soups. I use it for my smoothies everyday and my toddler loves her smoothies too! I see people complain about the noise......it’s 900W it’s not going to be super quiet. When my baby is sleeping, I take it to the next room, it’s light and easy to relocate if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharie

customer_reviews.title: gasket comes loose - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Gasket came loose from the blade after the first couple of uses. It's not supposed to ever separate. Nutribullet sent me a new blade but I had to pay shipping. Used the new blade for several months, and the gasket came loose. I am not buying a new blade every few months because of a manufacturing defect. This one goes in the trash. So disappointing because I had the original magic bullet for 13 years without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: blackhawk

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so in the past I bought a cheap smoothie blender. The cup and cap always smelled horrible and it started rusting after a few months. You get what you pay for. I spent the money on this NutriBullet and couldn’t be happier. It has lots of power and is easy to use and clean. I make smoothies at least twice a day and it has no problem fully mixing any powder I use (keto powders, vitamin powders, collagen peptides) as well as disintegrates my veggies and finely crushes ice. The cups and covers never smell after washing. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayani Vannah

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: This bullet is very powerful. I love how it powers right through my frozen berries. It is very easy to use and to clean. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 was due to the size of the cups. They are huge. It would have been nice to get one large and one half the size. When I have my drink I have to transfer it over to a smaller cup from my older Bullet. It was just impossible to drink out of. Yes, I might be able to buy a smaller one but I don't want to spend more money.
customer_reviews.author: teachme

customer_reviews.title: Ice is no match for this
customer_reviews.text: got this version because I killed my original nutribullet with ice. This thing belnds ice like butter. Perfect smoothies. Had nobidea it came with all the extras like the books and app and such when I ordered so those were a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Problems with the operation
customer_reviews.text: Dear Sirs: My little machine has no strength in smoothie I have observed that the base where the blade is seems to me as loose, there is a loud sound from the engine but the food does not move, and if it ever moves it is very slow that it does not cut them. All this has just happened to me this morning 10/10/2019 and it is not that I always use it .. I send you the video tomorrow I hope your help, pls! Marisol
customer_reviews.author: Marisol M.M. Quispe Flores

customer_reviews.title: better than a blender
customer_reviews.text: It's much easier to clean than a blender and has made it easier for me to have vegetables and fruits in my diet. I load up on tons of fruits and vegetables from costco and BJ's and supplement with protein powders every day. I feel much healthier since there was no way i had the time or energy to sit down and eat like a normal person. If you are a busy person and want to be a "clean" eater then I would say make the investment and take care of yourself. I am sure you could do this with a blender, but this is as simple as it gets. blend, drink from the container then clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carl V Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Will make you go deaf.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Nutribullet, and I coughed up the money to get the better model. I was so happy I did, and we use it ever day,...but the volume on this thing is literally deafening. It seems like it’s going to explode every time we use it. Ear piercing doesn’t even cut it. I tried contact amazon but they said I missed the 30 day window so now I’m stuck with this thing and will likely buy another brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Clark

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product. Buy a ninja blender ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. Buy a ninja blender or something a bit more traditional. One thing they do not mention anywhere on this is the issues yhou will have with the gaskets. Today after experiencing leaking the last week since i got it and removing the O-Ring and reseating it, the o ring became completly disengaged while blending and went into the blade. ONCE AGAIN DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Very Noisy and Doesn't Look Like the First Ones
customer_reviews.text: This equipment is so noisy! I think my neighbors know when I blend things. Jeez! Not only the noise, but they don't have the small cups or the other mixer heads, like they did before. I think Nutri-bullet decided to hold back on what they usually put in their packaging. I still have the small cups and other mixer heads from my two first Nutri-bullet blenders, so I will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Rayven

customer_reviews.title: Time for an upgrade to my 1st bullet.
customer_reviews.text: My old bullet finally died on me after about 5 years and 5 family members using it. I upgraded this time and got bigger and stronger version. This one has more capacity cups plus extra pieces for when you’re on the go.
customer_reviews.author: jose lira

customer_reviews.title: Must buy hearing protectors to use this...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this some months ago. At first worked well then problems began. Leaking, stopped working and now a deafening noise. To run this you need hearing protectors. This noise came on all at once. Tried covering with a towel, used silicone mat. Nothing worked. Disappointed. Tried to load short video of sound.
customer_reviews.author: BJK

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money on a better product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. I bought this at the end of February and am already in need of a new blender. I use it 3-4 times a week for smoothies. At first it worked great and now it’s smoking every time I use it. I wash it properly, don’t fill over the line etc so I don’t know why it’s not working as it should.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Dee

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality travel lid, questionable warranty support.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I've found the NutriBullet 900 useful, but the quality of the travel lid is poor. The first lid broke mysteriously after its first use, and the second broke the day before the warranty replacement for the first arrived (the plastic tab that keeps the flip top secured *crumbled* in my hand as I handwashed it). This is a deal-breaker for me because I commute with a smoothie as breakfast. I was uncomfortable with NutriBullet's response to my warranty request - they sent me the lid replacement as a "one-time courtesy". Doesn't give me much confidence in their customer service going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This product would’ve received 5 stars; however, It stopped working after one month of use. The cup is stuck in the blender and cannot be taken out. What a disappointment from a product that has such high ratings and high price. I would not recommend this item. I guess it’s Ninja bullet next time! Nutri bullet...you have lost my vote!
customer_reviews.author: Lsarig

customer_reviews.title: Needed a replacement part which is taking forever to have delivered.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for no matter how tight I made the cup to extractor blade it still leaked. Also should make the cup with ridges or something to be able to grip better to make it tight.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought a normal blender
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to use and extra cup Cons: Difficult to clean, because you have to remove the gasket. Smoothie gets underneath gasket. Runs hot, therefore smoothies can come out warm. To counter this you need frozen ingredients or ice. Overall I wish I would have bought a Vitamix. We have 2 at my store. They make great smoothies and are workhorses. Almost worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough bullet blender. Takes freezer ice, fruit, water and protein powder and makes it smoothie quality. No chuncks. Not an easy thing to do with large pieces of regular freezer ice. In the past i had to use crushed ice to get the same quailty of drink. Impressed thus far. Use bullet twice daily since purchase. Easy to clean, just rinse blade with dish soap and water. The bullet is bigger and heavier than i expected. Great purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: C. Holguin

customer_reviews.title: A little smoke and a bad burning odor and now it is done
customer_reviews.text: i have had this thing for 5 months and have basically used it every day. The thing is a rockstar when it comes to making smoothies. Why not 5 stars? Well, it crapped out on me this morning. Something burned up in the motor as I was blending my smoothie this morning. A little smoke and a bad burning odor and now it is done.. Can't say it was because I was trying to blend something harder than before. I literally make the same smoothie every day. Yes, I have got a lot of use out of it, but after 5 months I feel like this shouldn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, use every day
customer_reviews.text: I use this every single day and I was worried it wouldnt do ice or hemp seeds or chia well, but it does! All perfectly. Plus its small enough to throw in a bag when I travel. I love it. The cups are a little large for me and don't fit in my car's cup holders, which I dont love... I wish they sold ones with smaller bottoms, but I'm sure its something about the blending.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: From day one it was tricky to use. The rubber belt falls out, when smoothie gets all over the base/motor it’s next to impossible thoroughly clean it. Tonight after I locked it in to blend my smoothie it wouldn’t unlock/release the cup and the motor kept turning on and off. After 30 minutes of trying everything could think of to get the cup out I had no choice to pry it open. for you just let I had this blender for just over one month!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Love NutriBullet...bought this unit to replace my prior one that lasted 3+ years. Unfortunately, this unit just stopped working one day...a little less than 4 months after purchase. It was after the Amazon return window so I filed a warranty claim with NutriBullet and in 10 days (hopefully) should have my replacement product.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Returned due to leak and operation.
customer_reviews.text: No start/stop button. Starts immediately when you rotate the cup. Lends to premature failure of engaging parts. Cup also leaked the first couple of times need to really tighten that sucker on there. Cups are too big for smaller hands. The handle rings Do provide a nice way to carry but can’t use the travel lid in addition to the handle. When handle is used, the top of the cup is totally open.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love my NutriBullet
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I caught this on a good deal and figured I’d try it out. And I absolutely love it. I’ve made so many smoothies and I’m never disappointed. It blends everything down, even chia seeds and ginger so it’s not overbearing. I can prep everything in the cup the night before and it only takes a minute in the morning. I am completely obsessed. I’ll be ordering more cup sizes and am getting one for my niece. It is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chavela

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I use it at home and work. Having the two cups it comes with is great. I leave one at the office that I can use with the mixer there, and then I use the cup the remainder of the day to drink water from. Its super easy to clean and its compact. We have a vitamix at home, but I use this all the time now. If your making a protein drink for one person, its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TPAGE

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I make a smoothie every morning before work cause I don't usually have time to make breakfast and this has been a lifesaver. I'm amazed at how well and how quickly it blends frozen products. So much better than using a blender and more convenient and easy to clean. Just blend, put the lid on the cup and go!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Favorite color
customer_reviews.text: The hybrid is very powerful and easy to use. When pressing to start juicing, it is very labor-saving and easy to clean. I hope it will always work well!
customer_reviews.author: Haoyou

customer_reviews.title: ~  PRODUCT DAMAGED  ~
customer_reviews.text: RECEIVED PRODUCT ~ DID NOT OPEN PRODUCT BOX IMMEDIATELY HAD MULTIPLE SURGERIES; OPENED BOX; FOUND ELECTRICAL CORD WAS CUT; PRODUCT UNUSEABLE NEVER EVEN UNPACKAGED ~ LEFT AS IS WOULD LIKE TO RETURN PRODUCT AND BE RE-ISSUED EXACTLY IDENTICAL PRODUCT "COBALT BLUE/BULLET
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL I. GOLDFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: This blender works pretty well. Sometimes it doesn’t quite hold up to blending frozen ingredients, I have to add an awful lot of liquid and then my smoothies aren’t as thick as I want them to be, but overall it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Was great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered sept. 3rd 2017, after one year and two months the blender cap came apart. The blade separated from the nut holding it on. The nut stripped. What I hate about this product is how gross I found it to be under the rubber seals of the caps. Those things harbor such nastyness. It’s a pain to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Awaken

customer_reviews.title: Great blender- mediocre accessories
customer_reviews.text: The blender itself is great. Easy to use. Easy to clean. At first I thought I wouldn’t like that there are no adjustable settings (it’s either on or off), but it actually works great. I use mine primarily for smoothies, and I’ve had no issues with that. One bummer was that one of the flip top lids broke within 3 days of my purchase. The clip that seals it snapped off. So it’s useless now. The kit comes with 2, and the other one has been fine, so not sure if it was just a bad lid. Overall, great blender for smoothies, just be aware the accessories are not the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good blender
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new one to replace my older one I’ve had 3 years. Both were glitch with putting the container on in the right place (has 3 modules that fit and one particular one you must use vs the other 2. But it really blends things well and is the reason I bought this. Great for blending anything and for healthy smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motor smoking - can no longer get product support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender in July of 2019. Worked pretty well until a month ago when the motor started getting very loud during usage. The entire time I’ve had the blender, I’ve made sure not to overfill it and follow the directions. Well, a few day’s ago the blender started to smoke. It is now unsafe to use. Haven’t even had it a full year and it’s broken. Unfortunately, I’ve passed the point where I can no longer reach out to product support. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: meaghan hudak

customer_reviews.title: I've gone through 3 of these is 4 years.
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it really works. When it decides to die, it's done. And I am done with this product. It did get used about 3-6 times a day, but the last one made it only 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: PHein

customer_reviews.title: Dead after a year
customer_reviews.text: I used this a couple times a week for a year. Didn't use it for 6 months. Pulled it out and used it again 2 times and it died. Called Nutribullet. They told me it's my fault, I didn't use it correctly and so I could just buy a new one. I always followed all the directions and like it's blending power, etc. but appliances should last longer than a year. Im going to try a competitor.
customer_reviews.author: Okjane

customer_reviews.title: Unit Stopped Working and Started Smoking After Less Than A Year
customer_reviews.text: Unit lasted less than a year before it started smoking and burned out completely. Only made fruit/vegetable smoothies on it so I'm a little confused as to what happened. Fortunately we bought the insurance through Asurion and they are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Movieman721

customer_reviews.title: The extractor blades RUST
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this product. But after about 6 months I noticed rust coming from the extractor blades. So I replaced them. And the new extractor blades rust as well. This can't possibly be safe After reading many reviews, this is a common occurrence with this product. I am long past the date to return this product, so BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cory

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: The blender has worked very well (use is 4-5 times/week) for a year. I am impressed with its continued ability to crush ice and frozen fruit in smoothies (achieves thick consistency). However, the last few weeks, there has been a delay when I press down to activate the blender. The unit and blending apparatus are both clean; no spills and no obvious material preventing depression of the three plastic buttons in the unit. Today, it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Fast & easy & durable! Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm!!! Been using this daily since I got it and it still works like brand new!! Two giant cups included w lids && recipes book
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I love the power of it a great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Love it a bit hard to was there blade pet I suggest dishwasher if you can wait and aren’t using that often if you only run it once a day for safety reasons
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

product_meta.title: NutriBullet Pro - 13-Piece High-Speed Blender/Mixer System with Hardcover Recipe Book Included (900 Watts)
product_meta.description: Style:ChampagneNUTRIBULLET PRO 13-PIECE BLENDER/MIXER SYSTEM NutriBullet PRO features a powerful 900-watt motor with unique extraction blades and exclusive cyclonic action to break down, pulverize, and emulsify whole fruits and vegetables better than any standard blender or juicer, creating silky-smooth nutrient-extracted beverages that nourish your system from the inside out. Great for those who are active in their lives and proactive about their health, the NutriBullet PRO makes ultra-nutritious NutriBlast smoothies to enjoy at home or on the go. Its compact size and simple assembly fit onto any countertop, while its cups, blades, and accessories rinse clean under the tap or in the dishwasher. NutriBullet PRO is easy to use and easy to clean, and even comes with membership to a recipe site that features over 700 smoothie recipes and direct access to Registered Dietitians! The 13-Piece Set includes: - High-toque Power Base - 1 Emulsifying Extractor Blade - 2 32oz Colossal Cups - 2 Flip-Top Lids - 2 Handled Lip Rings - 2 Comfort Lip Rings - 1 Blasting for Optimum Health Recipe Book - 1 User Manual - 1 Pocket Nutritionist
feature_bullets: With 900 watts of power, the Pro is faster and stronger than the original, but just as simple to use. Load it up with dense whole foods like nuts, seeds, hard fruits, and kale, then push, twist and blend your way to a healthier lifestyle.
Optimized 900-watt motor and refined nutrient extraction blades blend The toughest whole foods into nutritious shakes, smoothies, and nut butters.
Included: (1) 900W motor base, (1) Extractor blade, (2) 32 oz. Cup, (2) to-go lid, (2) lip ring, (2) lip ring with handle and recipe book
Powerful stainless steel Extractor blades use Cyclonic action to break down tough ingredients. High-performance, BPA-free plastic cups are long lasting and Durable.
Hassle-free cleaning - simply twist off the blade, rinse with soap and water, and put the cups in the top rack of the dishwasher. This item comes with a 1 year Limited.
Limited time only: customize the color of your nutribullet to perfectly complement your kitchen!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars6,011 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
